Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card

Class GoldCardCorner

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.PlayableCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.GoldCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.GoldCardCorner
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GoldCardCorner extends GoldCard
Represents a gold card that awards points based on the number of corners it occupies on the field.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GoldCardCorner

      public GoldCardCorner(Symbol kingdom, Map<CornerPosition,Corner> frontCorners, Map<Symbol,Integer> requirements, int scorePerCorner, String id) throws InvalidSymbolException
      Constructs a gold card worth a specified score per corner that gets occupied.
      Parameters:
      kingdom - the kingdom symbol of the card
      frontCorners - the corners of the front side of the card
      requirements - the symbol requirements present on the front side of the card
      scorePerCorner - the number of points gained per corner that gets occupied
      id - the unique identifier of the card
      Throws:
      InvalidSymbolException - if the symbol of the card isn't of type kingdom

  • Method Details

    • getScorePerCorner

      public int getScorePerCorner()
      Retrieves the score per corner awarded by this card.
      Returns:
      The score per corner.

    • calcScore

      public int calcScore(PlayerField field, boolean isFront, Position pos)
      Calculates the score obtained by playing the card in the specified position on the player's field.
      Specified by:
      calcScore in class PlayableCard
      Parameters:
      field - the player's field
      isFront - true for the front side of the card, false for the back side
      pos - the position of the card in the player's field
      Returns:
      the score obtained by playing the card in the specified way
